targets.expr: count by(consumer) (rate({filename="/logs/logs.log"} |~ `\[INFO\]|\[ERROR\]` | pattern `<_> - <json_content>` | json consumer | consumer != ""  [$__range]))

sum by(method, uri, http) (
  count_over_time(
    {filename="/logs/logs.log"} 
    |~ `\[INFO\]|\[ERROR\]` 
    | pattern `<_> - <json_content>` 
    | json method="additionalInfo.method", uri="additionalInfo.uri", http="additionalInfo.responseCode" 
    | method != "" 
    | uri != "" 
    | http != "" [$__range]
  )
)

sum by (uri) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{job="$application", instance=~"$instance", uri!~"/actuator/.*"}[$__range]))
/ 
sum by (uri) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{job="$application", instance=~"$instance", uri!~"/actuator/.*"}[$__range]) > 0)

irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{instance=~"$instance", job="$application", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[5m]) / irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", job="$application", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[5m])
